text:
[Verse]
Watch the sky change color
Day turns into night
Sunset paints a wonder
Fading into light

[Verse 2]
City lights are glowing
Stars begin to rise
In the night it’s showing
Magic in disguise

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we’re chasing
Wishes in the breeze
Every night embracing
Endless fantasies

[Verse 3]
Shadows start their dance now
Moonlight on the street
In this night we allow
Time to feel so sweet

[Bridge]
Dreams like whispers calling
Heartbeats soft and slow
In this night we’re falling
In the twilight glow

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams we’re chasing
Wishes in the breeze
Every night embracing
Endless fantasies
title: Sunset Dreams
